= Export Alfresco Content =

  This module is started by a simple webscript call. To init the exportation you just use this URL in a browser:

 {{{
  http://{host}:{port}/alfresco/service/extencions/bulkexport/export?nodeRef={noderef}&base={base}&ignoreExported={ignoreExported?}
 }}}
